title: Abafatanyabikorwa Bacu
subtitle: Hamwe n'abafatanyabikorwa bacu b'agaciro bo mu Rwanda no ku isi hose, turimo kubaka urufatiro rukomeye rw'uburezi n'iterambere ry'umuryango.

globalReach.title: Kugera ku Isi Hose
globalReach.description: Ubufatanye bwacu bugera mu bihugu 18, buhuza ubuhanga butandukanye n'ubufasha kugira ngo dushyigikire uburezi mu Rwanda no hanze.

becomePartner.title: Ba Umufatanyabikorwa
becomePartner.description: Ifatanye n'intego yacu yo guhindura uburyo bw'uburezi buterwa inkunga mu Rwanda. Niba uri ikigo cy'imari, sosiyete y'ikoranabuhanga, ONG cyangwa ikigo cya Leta, hari umwanya wawe mu muryango wacu ukura.
